text:
California, you have just 3 days to mail or drop your #CArecall absentee ballot!

You can register to vote in person at your registrar's office or polling site through election day Tuesday. https://t.co/I9J7Uhl1Rn

Need help? Call @866OURVOTE 

#VoteNoOnTheRecall
#CleanWaterVoter https://t.co/NGzorsJWS4
